title: New: Laura Welsh – Unravel
body:
**Jessie Ware** happened, the world got pretty excited, so it stands to reason that musicians are going to want to replicate such a sound.

**Laura Welsh**’s new cut, _Unravel_, takes her style and runs with it, not exactly into unconquered territory, but at least into a space that showcases her range, which as it happens could be pretty exciting. Oh and **Dev Hynes** produced the track, which is probably why you’ve already heard it.

Hut play or D/L below.
